name: leaflet-addlabels
description: Display the labels following polylines for Leaflet

scripts.build: npm install && npm audit fix --force && uglifyjs src/L.LabelTextCollision.js src/Leaflet.addlabels.js -o dist/Leaflet.addlabels.js && uglifyjs src/L.LabelTextCollision.js src/Leaflet.addlabels.js
